description: Tempting treats await inside the 'Corner Bakery!' From cookies to cupcakes, to a dozen different pies, there’s something to satisfy every sweet tooth inside this charming shop! Fresh-baked loaves of savory breads along with buttery melt-in-your-mouth rolls are ready to be bagged and brought home for dinner. And don’t forget dessert! Of course, there’s chocolate: eclairs, brownies, cannoli and delicious, decadent devil’s food cake — yum! Best of all, you can enjoy puzzling these sweet treats without gaining an ounce! This 750-piece Large Format jigsaw puzzle combines easy-to-handle, clean-cut pieces and Ravensburger’s perfect interlocking fit for a most pleasurable puzzling experience. With pieces 30% larger than standard, details are easy to see so you can complete it in just a day or two. Create memorable moments with Ravensburger premium puzzles!
